description: This file contains a utility function 'get_text_from_message' that extracts user-readable text from various message formats, including strings, lists, dictionaries, and Message objects, within a messaging system.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: A class representing a message object, imported from agno.models.message, used within the get_text_from_message function.

methods.name: get_text_from_message
methods.description: Extracts and returns the user-visible text content from a message object or data structure.
